channel.title: CVE Feed for Proofpoint -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Proofpoint -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4801|2024-09-25T17:38:58.900Z -- proofpoint -- insider%20threat%20management
item.description: An improper certification validation vulnerability in the Insider Threat Management (ITM) Agent for MacOS could be used by an anonymous actor on an adjacent network to establish a man-in-the-middle position between the agent and the ITM server after the agent has registered. All versions prior to 7.14.3.69 are affected. Agents for Windows, Linux, and Cloud are unaffected.

item.title: CVE-2024-0862|2024-08-20T18:43:47.007Z -- proofpoint -- enterprise%20protection
item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability that allows an authenticated user to relay HTTP requests from the Protection server to otherwise private network addresses.

item.title: CVE-2024-3676|2024-08-01T20:19:59.948Z -- proofpoint -- enterprise%20protection
item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker with a specially crafted HTTP request to create additional Encryption user accounts under the attacker's control. These accounts are able to send spoofed email to any users within the domains configured by the Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-0862|2024-05-14T19:07:04.897Z -- proofpoint -- enterprise%20protection
item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability that allows an authenticated user to relay HTTP requests from the Protection server to otherwise private network addresses.

item.description: The Proofpoint Encryption endpoint of Proofpoint Enterprise Protection contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker with a specially crafted HTTP request to create additional Encryption user accounts under the attacker's control. These accounts are able to send spoofed email to any users within the domains configured by the Administrator.
